description: This file defines a React component for an image detail page in a real estate image enhancement application. It manages fetching and displaying an image and its history, allows prompts for image editing, and handles user authentication.

methods.name: ImageDetailPage
methods.description: React functional component rendering image details, edit history, and prompting functionality.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches image and history data concurrently and updates component state.

methods.name: submitPrompt
methods.description: Handles user prompt submission to request image edits and refreshes data.
